Title: Data Engineer
RoleDescription: Remote: 1x day per month expected in our Keynsham office Do you want to help power better outcomes for pets, vets, and pet owners alike?IVC Evidensia is undergoing an exciting digital transformation. The key to this is to improve the management of our core data sets. Knowledge and experience of ELT, orchestration, and scripting languages (such as T-SQL) are important. Along with this, a firm grasp of data modelling and management will be essential. Who are we We are a global leader in veterinary care, investing in our people, premises and processes to deliver outstanding care in around 2,500 locations across 20 countries. At IVC Evidensia, exceptional animal care is a team effort - and that includes the vital work of our central support teams. Whether in HR, marketing, operations, IT, finance, or beyond, these roles keep our clinics running smoothly and effectively. By supporting our people and processes behind the scenes, they enable our practice teams to focus on delivering the highest standard of care to animals and their owners, delivering our promise of Healthy Animals, Happy Owners.
